record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL TUESDAY, APRIL 10, 2007, AT 10 A.M.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the provisions of H. Con. Res. 103.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:22 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, April 10, 2007, at 10 a.m.
